Entire Month June

Summer heat

With summer ramping up, so do outside temperatures. Between May and June we see a sizeable increase in average temperature in areas that have typical summers. This means the need for potential emergency repairs, filter changes, and finding ways to keep homes cool without breaking the bank.

Seasonal

Spring Maintenance

For many, A/C systems will click on for the first time since last summer. Scheduling routine maintenance can prevent pricey fixes down the road. Tasks often include: testing and cleaning the blower fan, checking the level of coolant in the cooling system, and testing the systemâ€™s thermostat and operation.
